about.first: My approach is autonomous and passionate in everything I do. I have a great ability to take responsibility for projects and adapt easily to different environments.
about.second: I always face challenges with a positive attitude and am constantly seeking challenges that drive me. I crave to surround myself with people who share the same ambition for continuous improvement.
